description: This is a Python source file that provides functions to generate JSON-RPC API headers, classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementation code based on a JSON schema. It includes functions CreateApiHeader and Create that handle different aspects of code generation, leveraging external modules for emitting code and processing schema details.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file containing the JSON-RPC API definitions based on provided headers and source name, with includes and formatting.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that processes a JSON schema to generate C++ code, classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementation code based on configuration flags.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
